record.description: Fifth (surrounding) row: Anderson, A. W. Smith, [Charles] Lederer, [Franklin H.] Geselbracht, [Lawrence] DeGraff, Miss [Helen] Ball, Harris, Miss [Florence] Ball, [Harry] McGee, [Edward M.] Baker, [Banks J.] Wildman, [Edwin C.] Woolley, Miss [Alice] Ransom, Miss Bishop, [Trevor] Arnett, Hack, Miss [Della] Austrian, Miss [Clara A.] Tilton, and [John F.] Hagey; fourth row: Miss DeCew, Miss [Nellie] Lenington, Miss [Angelina] Loesch, Miss [Harriet] Jenkinson, Miss Pollard, and [Hiram] Gillespie; third row: Stowell, [George] Pfirshing, Miss [Juliet] Harris, Miss [Lillian] Goldsmith, Miss [Neletta] Pettit; second row: White, Butterwort, unidentified man, Miss [Eva B.] Graves; first row: Miss Bevans, Miss [Susan] Harding, Miss [Laura L.] Runyan, Graves, and [David Moon] Robinson. Gift of Robert Graves, Class of 1898.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Original in Oversize A, see also Cap and Gown, 1898 for correct names and spelling.
